<Text: It (novel):  The story follows the experiences of seven children as they are terrorized by a being that exploits the fears and phobias of its victims to disguise itself while hunting its prey.>

<Text: It (novel):  "It" primarily appears in the form of a clown to attract its preferred prey of young children.>
